item.title: Let's Drive This Huge Tractor!
item.description: What's it like to get behind the wheel of a massive tractor? This video is a first-hand look at the unique experience, showing the view from the cab and the power of the huge machine.

media:content.media:title: Let's Drive This Huge Tractor!
media:content.media:description: What's it like to get behind the wheel of a massive tractor? This video is a first-hand look at the unique experience, showing the view from the cab and the power of the huge machine.

item.title: On The Hunt for an Old Tractor!
item.description: What happens when you go searching for vintage iron? This video documents our thrilling hunt for an old tractor, showing the hidden gems we found and the moment we decided on our next project.

item.title: We're Gearing Up For The Harvest
item.description: Harvest is almost here, and it's time to prepare! This video documents the essential work of inspecting and gearing up our equipment, showing you what it takes to get ready for the busiest season of the year.

item.title: Trying The Old Tractor!
item.description: A restoration project has its first big test. We’ll show you the challenge of getting an old tractor to turn on after years of sitting in the field.

item.title: I Got a FISH!
item.description: Join me to see the catch and all the action on the water.

item.title: Will This Keep China Off U.S. Farm Ground?
item.description: This video explores the national debate surrounding foreign ownership of US farmland. We break down the proposed legislation and discuss whether it will be effective in restricting land purchases by China.

item.title: Big Machines, Big Harvest: Chopping Silage At The Home Farm
item.description: Go inside the massive silage harvest. We'll show you the powerful machinery and the precise techniques needed to quickly chop and haul feed for the livestock.

item.title: The Perfect "PickUp"
item.description: What makes a truck truly great? This video breaks down the performance, features, and value of a top-rated pickup you should consider for your next purchase.

item.title: It's Quite Dusty Out There!
item.description: This is the story of a particularly dusty day in the field, showing the extra effort and safety precautions required to get the job done.

item.title: Replacing the Sickle
item.description: Learn the fundamental skill of equipment maintenance. This video walks you through the easy process of replacing the sickle bar, ensuring your machine performs at peak efficiency.

item.title: Hooking Onto A Trailer Like A Pro Or Not?
item.description: We’ll show you the pro techniques for connecting a trailer and whether we managed to avoid a frustrating day on the job.

item.title: Will This Bulldozer Start?
item.description: After years of sitting, is this old bulldozer ready to come back to life? Join us for the moment of truth as we attempt to start the engine for the very first time.

item.title: A Chaotic Way of Driving a Bulldozer #reel #bulldozer #farmlife #fblifestyle #laurafarms
item.description: A Chaotic Way of Driving a Bulldozer #reel #bulldozer #farmlife #fblifestyle #laurafarms

item.title: How Many People Fit in a Combine Cab?
item.description: Go inside a modern combine. This video breaks down the cab's interior, showing you the layout and explaining the true seating capacity of this massive piece of machinery.

item.title: This is how I Drive the Combine!
item.description: Go inside the combine cab with me. This video breaks down my personal driving technique, showing the tips and tricks I use to get the job done right every time.

item.title: This Is How They Check The Quality Of Corn ��
item.description: Ever wonder how corn is inspected before it reaches the market? This video explains the grading process, showing you how moisture content, damage, and test weight determine the final quality and value of the crop.

item.title: Pivot Irrigator vs. Drip Irrigation
item.description: Learn how to choose the right system for your farm. This expert guide compares Pivot and Drip irrigation, focusing on maximizing yield, saving water, and cutting long-term costs.

item.title: POV: Farming Simulator In REAL LIFE
item.description: The reality of farming, from a first-person view. This video documents the day-to-day challenges and rewards of farm work, comparing the real-life experience to the video game.

item.title: 14-Hour Road Trip To Pick Up What?
item.description: What was a 14-hour road trip for? This video documents a long drive and the big surprise that waited for us at the end.

item.title: Desert Camping Was Really Peaceful!
item.description: The secret to a good break? A peaceful escape to the desert. This video documents a camping trip that was as serene as it was unforgettable.
